attributes.action: Reveal the Secret Government Illegal Ninja Moves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Revealing your secret illegal ninja tactics can only aid the common man in his daily struggle against lawlessness and anti social behaviour. Revealing this information would free up your secret ninjas for work abroad. You would not be setting a precedent, web sites such as wikihowl.com already provide the means to request the American equivalent from their government.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
